title: The Strands grow
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, The Conservation Foundation, New York Zoological Society and George Brewer
brief_description: Uses fossil remains and other prehistoric records to make the point that communities of plants and animals have existed on earth only to be replaced by others when they have failed to adjust themselves to changes in their environment. The growth and development of the climax forest is shown in detail to emphasise the meaning and significance of a state of balance in nature.
